name: part_010
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2023】3Dバラエティ！あびゃびゃ！全国おいしい発見！～高級食材で牛丼づくりに挑む～【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [Si2W-gcT1Lw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Noel introduces a special chance to gain high points by guessing the ingredients of a brine solution. The guests are excited and ask for hints.
Amane Kanata announces a Reversal Bonus Chance. The members find YAGOO figures under their desks, which they can bet to get 10x points. They start filling in their answers.
Kanata provides hints: one ingredient is 5g per 100ml of water and isn't a liquid. The members struggle to guess, and Kanata checks their answers privately, finding some worrisome ones.
The answers of the three guests are revealed. Pekora and Marine both guessed salt and sugar, while Flare guessed salt and pepper.
The guests decide to bet their YAGOO figures and 'Danii-san' mascots. Finally, Noel's answer is revealed to be sugar and salt.

subtitles.original: 二つの調味料を全て当ててください！
subtitles.english: Guess both of the seasonings correctly!

subtitles.original: 何？最後に一発逆転？
subtitles.english: What? A last-minute comeback?

subtitles.original: 超高得点ゲットのチャンスだよ！肉を柔らかくする...
subtitles.english: It's a chance to get super high points! To make the meat tender...

subtitles.original: みんなも頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: Good luck, everyone!

subtitles.original: 動き、動き！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Movement, movement! Yay!

subtitles.original: 動きうるさいぺこ。ヒントとかないの、これ？ヒント、ヒント、ヒント！
subtitles.english: Your movements are noisy, peko. Are there any hints for this? Hints, hints, hints!

subtitles.original: 逆転ボーナスチャンスということで、皆様、机の下をご覧ください！
subtitles.english: As this is a Reversal Bonus Chance, everyone, please look under your desks!

subtitles.original: 何これ？え、何これ？ちょっと待って、これ...
subtitles.english: What's this? Eh, what is it? Wait a second, this is...

subtitles.original: 何これ？人形がいる！何だろう？
subtitles.english: What is this? There's a figure here! I wonder what it is?

subtitles.original: はい、皆さん、YAGOOがいまーしたー！こちらのYAGOOをBETすることができまして...
subtitles.english: Yes, everyone, it's YAGOO! You can bet this YAGOO figure, and...

subtitles.original: BETすると何と...
subtitles.english: ...if you bet it, then remarkably...

subtitles.original:
10倍だ！
10倍です！
subtitles.english:
Ten times!
It's ten times!

subtitles.original: えー！今までの何だったんだ
subtitles.english: Ehh! What was all that effort for until now?

subtitles.original: そうだ、最初から欲しかった。ズルだよこれ最初から欲しかった
subtitles.english: Exactly, I wanted this from the start. That's a foul, I wanted it from the start.

subtitles.original: 1ポイントに10倍だから、それだけで、ぺこら先輩ですらも勝てるということで
subtitles.english: Since it's 10x for 1 point, even Pekora-senpai can win with just that.

subtitles.original: おー！食べれるぺこ。でもブライン液がわかんない...
subtitles.english: Oh! I might be able to eat, peko. But I don't know what brine solution is...

subtitles.original: わかんない... ブライン液... はい、ということで皆様、回答の記入、お願いいたします
subtitles.english: I don't know... brine solution... Alright, everyone, please write down your answers.

subtitles.original: え、これ問題、ヒントないの？これ
subtitles.english: Wait, are there no hints for this question?

subtitles.original: ノーヒント？ノーヒント？うそでしょ！
subtitles.english: No hints? No hints? You've gotta be kidding!

subtitles.original: 欲しい欲しい、ヒント欲しい！
subtitles.english: I want one, I want a hint!

subtitles.original: まあ、料理をする人は知ってるかもしれないんですが、水100mlに対して...
subtitles.english: Well, those who cook might know this, but per 100ml of water...

subtitles.original: 何々が5g...
subtitles.english: ...you add 5g of something...

subtitles.original: 5g? なるほどね。グラムってことはあれだよ、グラムだよ
subtitles.english: 5g? I see. If it's in grams, it's gotta be that.

subtitles.original: グラム、グラム...
subtitles.english: Grams, grams...

subtitles.original: 皆さんの家に絶対ある
subtitles.english: You definitely have it in your home.

subtitles.original: 全員ある、多分。自炊をするならば100%ありますよ
subtitles.english: Everyone has it, probably. If you cook for yourself, you have it 100%.

subtitles.original: グラム... 見たことないってことはない
subtitles.english: Grams... It's impossible that you've never seen it.

subtitles.original: だって液体だったらさっきみたいにmlっていうけど、そう、液体じゃない
subtitles.english: Because if it were a liquid, you'd say ml like before. Right, it's not a liquid.

subtitles.original: 液体じゃない。グラム系のものね
subtitles.english: It's not a liquid. It's something measured in grams.

subtitles.original: あ〜もう大ヒント出しちゃったな
subtitles.english: Ah, I gave away a huge hint.

subtitles.original:
え、絶対にある？本当？
ありますよ、絶対にありますよ
subtitles.english:
Eh, we definitely have it? Really?
You do, you definitely have it.

subtitles.original: かなた、絶対みんなあるの、絶対みんなある？
subtitles.english: Kanata, everyone definitely has it? Everyone?

subtitles.original:
絶対あるよ
え、待って、これちょっと書き始めて顔見よう
subtitles.english:
You definitely do.
Wait, let me start writing and then look at your face.

subtitles.original: あははは、いやでもこれじゃない！
subtitles.english: Ahahaha, no, it's not this!

subtitles.original: これじゃない、これじゃねえぺこ
subtitles.english: It's not this, it's not this, peko.

subtitles.original: かなたちゃんぺこらのどう？
subtitles.english: Kanata-chan, how's Pekora's?

subtitles.original: かなたさん、みんなの家にはあるよね？
subtitles.english: Kanata-san, it's in everyone's home, right?

subtitles.original: もっと、もっとメジャーなもの。これみんなの家にある？
subtitles.english: Something more... more major. Is this in everyone's home?

subtitles.original: えっ、違う！かなた、私のも見て
subtitles.english: Eh, no! Kanata, look at mine too.

subtitles.original: もっとメジャーなやつ。これは？
subtitles.english: A more major one. This is...?

subtitles.original: あ〜、フレアもそれやばいぞ。まず食べられねえぞ
subtitles.english: Ah, Flare, yours is bad too. First of all, it's inedible.

subtitles.original: フレア頑張れ、いけるぞ
subtitles.english: Good luck, Flare, you can do it.

subtitles.original: あー！
subtitles.english: Agh!

subtitles.original: 惜しい、惜しい！
subtitles.english: So close, so close!

subtitles.original: そこまで来たら答えは一つじゃないですか
subtitles.english: If it's come to that, isn't there only one answer?

subtitles.original: そろそろ時間か〜？うわ、ちょっと待って、えー
subtitles.english: Is it almost time? Whoa, wait a second, uh...

subtitles.original: あれ、団長は？え、ちょ？
subtitles.english: Wait, what about Danchou? Eh, wait?

subtitles.original: え、アイノエル食えないパターンあるかこれワンチャン
subtitles.english: Wait, is there a chance Noel won't be able to eat?

subtitles.original: え？アイノエル食えないパターンあるか、これワンチャン
subtitles.english: Eh? Is there a chance Noel won't be able to eat?

subtitles.original: はい、ということで皆さん、回答が出揃ってきましたということで
subtitles.english: Alright, so everyone's answers are all in.

subtitles.original: ではまた団長以外の3人の回答を一斉に表示していきましょう
subtitles.english: Now then, let's reveal the answers of the three guests at once.

subtitles.original: ドン！
subtitles.english: Bam!

subtitles.original: はい、何て書いてある？
subtitles.english: Okay, what's written?

subtitles.original: えーと、ぺこら先輩とマリン、ちょっとYAGOO邪魔だな
subtitles.english: Let's see, Pekora-senpai and Marine... YAGOO is a bit in the way.

subtitles.original: YAGOOの顔で、はい、塩、砂糖
subtitles.english: Behind YAGOO's face... okay, salt and sugar.

subtitles.original: そしてフレア先輩が塩、こしょう
subtitles.english: And Flare-senpai put salt and pepper.

subtitles.original:
こしょうじゃない！そっか〜
それ間違えるわ〜
subtitles.english:
It's not pepper! I see...
I'd totally make that mistake.

subtitles.original: いや〜分かれるかもしれませんよ。わかんないですけれども
subtitles.english: Well, they might be divided. I don't know, though.

subtitles.original: これでフレア合ってたらどうする？かなたが罠で...
subtitles.english: What if Flare is right? What if Kanata's hint was a trap?

subtitles.original: うわ〜罠の可能性もあるけど
subtitles.english: Whoa, there's a possibility of a trap, but...

subtitles.original: じゃあマリンどうしますか、BETしますか？
subtitles.english: Well then, Marine, what will you do? Will you bet?

subtitles.original: しますよ、当たり前っしょ！団員さーん！
subtitles.english: I will, of course! Danii-san!

subtitles.original: すみません団員さーん、出てきて
subtitles.english: Excuse me, Danii-san, please come out.

subtitles.original: 全BETでいきますか？はい、出てきて、はい、きました
subtitles.english: Going for an all-in bet? Yes, come out, okay, here they are.

subtitles.original: じゃあ団員さんとYAGOO全BET、これでいきます
subtitles.english: Then, all-in on Danii-san and YAGOO. I'll go with this.

subtitles.original: これで当たってたら40ポイント貰えますからね
subtitles.english: If you get it right, you'll get 40 points.

subtitles.original: うわー！YAGOO一個落ちたぞ
subtitles.english: Whoa! One YAGOO fell down.

subtitles.original:
なんかありました？今
なんか不吉だな、不吉だな
subtitles.english:
Did something just happen?
Something's ominous, very ominous.

subtitles.original: 不吉だな、並べてと
subtitles.english: It's ominous. Let's line them up.

subtitles.original: 場所が嫌だな
subtitles.english: I don't like the placement.

subtitles.original: じゃあフレア先輩
subtitles.english: Next, Flare-senpai.

subtitles.original: 賭けないと終わるので賭けます。復活狙いましょう
subtitles.english: If I don't bet, it'll be over, so I'll bet. Let's aim for a comeback.

subtitles.original: 団員さんも呼んでおいてください
subtitles.english: Please call Danii-san too.

subtitles.original: 可愛い。もしかしたら当たってるかもしれないから
subtitles.english: Cute. Since there's a chance I'm right.

subtitles.original: フレア先輩も全BETということで
subtitles.english: Flare-senpai is also going all-in.

subtitles.original: ぺこーらはYAGOO人形賭けまーす！
subtitles.english: Pekora will bet her YAGOO figure!

subtitles.original: みんなもBETしていきますね。YAGOOが揺れております
subtitles.english: Everyone is betting. YAGOO is shaking.

subtitles.original: それではですね、団長の答え見ていきましょうか
subtitles.english: Now then, let's see Danchou's answer.

subtitles.original: こちらです！はい！
subtitles.english: Here it is! Bam!

subtitles.original: 砂糖と塩！
subtitles.english: Sugar and salt!

subtitles.original: Q. ブライン液を作るために水と合わせる2つの調味料とは？
subtitles.english: Q. What are the two seasonings to combine with water to make brine solution?
